DEFAULT.question: What is the cost that my bank would charge me for doing an LRS?
DEFAULT.answer:
For any LRS transaction, the banks generally charge a forex conversion rate and a service charge plus tax for doing any outward remittances. 

Groww is working with multiple Indian banks for a pre-negotiated rate on remittances for its users. 

You can find these banks available on Growwâ€™s platform.

DEFAULT.question: How do I withdraw money from a US brokerage account to my Indian savings account?
DEFAULT.answer:
The withdrawal process is fairly straight forward. 

1. Select the withdraw icon
2. Enter amount to withdraw
3. Confirm bank details

The amount will be wired back to your bank account within 3-5 business working days.

Note: You have to use the same bank account for all funding and withdrawal purposes.

DEFAULT.question: Can I change my bank account later for transactions?
DEFAULT.answer:
It is not suggested to change the bank account upon a successful transaction. 

This is because of AML (Anti Money Laundering) law that the governing agencies file and monitor. 

However, if you wish to change your bank account provided a genuine reason, in cases like bank account closure, etc. please contact us.

DEFAULT.question: Can I use my existing Indian Groww Balance to fund my US account?
DEFAULT.answer:
No, Groww balance can only be used for Indian stock and MF investments and not for US stocks.

You are funding your own brokerage account from India to invest in US stocks. You could consider this as your USD balance.
